newsitem.title: USA: MBIA qualifies eight issues for bond insurance.
newsitem.headline: MBIA qualifies eight issues for bond insurance.

text.p: MBIA Insurance Corp said it has qualified for bond insurance the following eight municipal issues scheduled for competitive sale today.
--Mount Pleasant Comm., Iowa, $4.210 million school general obligation bonds.
--Urbandale Comm. School District, Iowa, $4.9 million school bonds and $3.81 million school refunding bonds.
--Mississippi Home $21.835 million and $5.02 million Single Family Mortgage Revenue bonds.
--Bainbridge Island SD, Wash., $17 million unlimited tax bonds.
